subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description:
1. A trained and strengthened inter-agency coordinating body 
2. An updated NIPPP that includes multi-sector pandemic preparedness 
3. A developed and tested SOP or Action Plan operational at the national and district levels 
4. Trained focal persons across all sectors in multi-sector pandemic preparedness
5. Lessons learnt and good practices from other country experiences in multi-sector pandemic preparedness
subproject.title: Central Fund for Influenza Act
